events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application for medical expenses on time and provided initial details.
The loan application was categorised under Personal Loan due to the mention of medical bills and debt consolidation.
A loan officer was assigned to manage the case and provide support throughout the application process.
The initial review was conducted focusing on the applicant’s income, employment status, and stated loan purpose.
Additional financial documents and medical bills were requested to verify the applicant’s stated expenses and debts.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including payslips, medical invoices, and identification promptly.
Credit report was reviewed, showing a stable credit history despite some recent debt related to medical emergencies.
Risk assessment balanced the applicant’s debt levels and stable employment against current financial obligations.
The loan offer was presented outlining interest rates, repayment terms, and total amount approved based on assessment.
Applicant reviewed the loan offer and provided positive feedback, requesting minor clarifications on repayment options.
The application was escalated to senior management due to applicant’s request for a custom repayment arrangement.
Senior management approved the loan with revised terms that accommodate the applicant’s requested repayment schedule.
Funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debts.
Follow-up call confirmed the applicant has received funds and clarified any questions regarding repayment schedule.
The loan application process was successfully closed after final confirmation of all terms and disbursement.
